response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire a product that holds significant value to both of us. This product, tailored to your specific needs and interests, is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I believe it has the potential to greatly enhance your life or business. I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special introductory price of $900,000. This offer is designed to reflect its true worth while providing you with a considerable saving compared to its market value. I understand that decisions of this magnitude require careful consideration, so please take the time to evaluate the offer thoughtfully. Should you have any questions or wish to discuss further details, I am more than happy to provide additional information. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 900000}
